product_summary: karaok-AI is an open-source karaoke Player / Editor with automatic clip creation from any song file using vocals and lyrics extraction (Speech-to-Text). It includes a lyrics and timestamps editor, a screener with synchronized lyrics, and auto-extract and edit example. It uses WhisperHallu and WhisperTimeSync to extract vocals and lyrics.
product_cons: May not be as feature-rich as commercial karaoke software
May not be suitable for professional use
May not be able to handle all song files
May not be able to extract vocals and lyrics perfectly

product_usecases.details: karaok-AI can be used to create karaoke clips from any song file, making it perfect for karaoke parties.
karaok-AI can be used to create karaoke videos with synchronized lyrics, making it easy to share karaoke performances with others.
karaok-AI can be used to help people learn to sing by providing them with real-time feedback on their pitch and timing.
karaok-AI can be used to transcribe songs, making it easy to create lyrics sheets or share song lyrics with others.
karaok-AI can be used to create mashups by combining vocals and lyrics from different songs.

product_toolfor.details: karaok-AI is a great tool for karaoke enthusiasts who want to create their own karaoke clips or videos.
karaok-AI can be used by musicians to help them learn to sing or to transcribe songs.
karaok-AI can be used by educators to help students learn to sing or to transcribe songs.
karaok-AI can be used by content creators to create karaoke videos or mashups.
karaok-AI is a great tool for anyone who loves music and wants to have fun with it.
